description: Convolution of A000917 with A000984 (central binomial coefficients).
comments: Also convolution of A007054 (Super ballot numbers) with A002697;
formula: a(n)= n*4^(n+1)+binomial(2*n+3, n+1), G.f.: c(x)*(4-c(x))/(1-4*x)^2, where c(x) = g.f. for Catalan numbers A000108;
author: _Wolfdieter Lang_
